MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsThumbnail AddThumbnail(valuetype System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType imageType) cil managed
Public Function AddThumbnail (imageType As XpsImageType) As XpsThumbnail

Docs.param: The image type of the thumbnail to add.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For example, the `imageType` might be <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.JpegImageType> or <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsImageType.PngImageType>.

block.para: Only one thumbnail image can represent the document as a whole (although individual pages can have their own thumbnail images). An is thrown if is called when the document already has a thumbnail.

public: property int DocumentNumber { int get(); };

Docs.summary: Gets the zero-based position of the in the .
Docs.value: The zero-based position of the in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.DocumentNumber%2A> property is zero-based. A <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.DocumentNumber%2A> value of zero (0) indicates the first the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument> in the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocumentSequence>.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Printing::PrintTicket ^ PrintTicket { void set(System::Printing::PrintTicket ^ value); };

Docs.summary: Sets default print options for the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Setting this property does not validate or modify the specified <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> for a particular <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>. If needed, use the <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue.MergeAndValidatePrintTicket%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Printing.PrintQueue>-specific <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> that is valid for a given printer.
## Examples The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.IXpsFixedDocumentWriter.PrintTicket%2A> property to associate a <xref:System.Printing.PrintTicket> with a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.FixedDocument>.
